title: 70 MB daily
info: 70 MB of Internet for 1 day at the price of 5 Afghanis. Only for Facebook network. To activate, press the green button and to deactivate, press the red button. To activate, dial *232*5*1#  .

info: 75 MB of Internet for 1 day at the price of 5 Afghani. Only for VIBER network. To activate, press the green button and to deactivate, press the red button. To activate, dial *232*75*1#  Do it.
